text: Sandra Caldarone (born 15 October 1972), better known as Sandra Kim, is a Belgian-Italian singer. She won the Eurovision Song Contest 1986, representing Belgium with the song "J'aime la vie". She was 13 years old at the time of her win, making her the youngest ever Eurovision winner. She has made television appearances as a contestant on the Belgian Masked Singer and a judge on Drag Race Belgium. == Sources == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners Category:Belgian singers
title: Sandra Kim
